name: FluTool
0:
”Alexa, open flu tool”
”Alexa, start flu tool”
”Alexa, launch flu tool”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flu tool
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sometimes it’s hard to know if the aches and pains you are feeling might be the flu or something else. Use the Flu Tool to evaluate your symptoms and help determine if you might have the flu and should seek medical care.
 
Although Alexa is not a doctor, her questions and suggestions were written by an expert Vanderbilt physician to help you decide when to seek care. They should not be used to replace recommendations of your own doctor or other healthcare provider. 
 
If your symptoms change or you have any concerns at all, seek medical attention immediately.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
